item.title: Vegetable broth
item.description:
ü•ï Simple Homemade Vegetable Broth + What To Do With the Vegetables After

‚≠ê Ingredients (makes 1.5‚Äì2 L broth)

  • 2 carrots
  • 2 celery stalks
  • 1 onion
  • 3 garlic cloves (optional)
  • 1‚Äì2 bay leaves
  • 6‚Äì8 peppercorns
  • Small handful of parsley (optional)
  • Salt (added at the end)
  • 2 litres water

Optional add-ins

  • Mushroom stems
  • Leek tops
  • Tomato ends
  • A small piece of ginger
  • Corn cobs

üç≤ Instructions

1) Prep the vegetables

Wash everything (no peeling needed).
Cut into large chunks.
